mapper.insert: insert into store_product(store_id, product_id, input_price, output_price, created_at) values(#{storeId},#{productId},#{inputPrice},#{outputPrice}, now())
mapper.select:
select sp.id as id, sp.store_id as storeId, sp.product_id as productId, sp.input_price as inputPrice, sp.output_price as outputPrice, sp.created_at as createdAt, p.item_name as itemName, p.item_image as itemImage from store_product sp inner join product p on sp.product_id = p.id
where sp.store_id like CONCAT('%', #{storeId}, '%')
where p.id like CONCAT('%', #{productId}, '%')
where item_name like CONCAT('%', #{itemName}, '%')
order by sp.id
